name: connectivityhook
description: A comprehensive React hook for network status and bandwidth testing.

scripts.build:cjs: babel src --out-dir dist/cjs --extensions ".ts,.tsx" --copy-files --source-maps inline --root-mode upward --env-name cjs
scripts.build:esm: babel src --out-dir dist/esm --extensions ".ts,.tsx" --copy-files --source-maps inline --root-mode upward --env-name esm
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:types && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
